total_revenue_tkr.notes: Sum of all operating income (Nettoomsättning + Övriga rörelseintäkter)

property_revenue_tkr.notes: Includes Årsavgifter (880 tkr) + Hyror bostäder (210 tkr) + other minor items

interest_revenue_tkr.notes: Interest income and similar financial income

operational_costs_tkr.notes: Includes property costs, repairs, utilities, taxes and other operational expenses

maintenance_costs_tkr.notes: Repair costs within Driftkostnader, does not include periodic maintenance (Periodiskt underhåll was 0 in 2019)

administrative_costs_tkr.notes: Includes management fees (förvaltningsarvode), board costs, and administrative expenses

interest_costs_tkr.notes: Association has no loans (inga lån) as stated on page 3

net_result_tkr.notes: Net result after financial items and taxes

fixed_assets_tkr.notes: Fixed assets including buildings (13,213 tkr), ongoing construction (1,562 tkr), and financial assets (2 tkr)

current_assets_tkr.notes: Current assets including receivables, short-term investments, and cash

cash_bank_tkr.notes: Cash and bank balances at year end

total_liabilities_tkr.notes: Total liabilities (all short-term, no long-term liabilities)

long_term_liabilities_tkr.original_string: Föreningen har i dagsläget inga lån
long_term_liabilities_tkr.notes: No long-term liabilities - association has no loans

short_term_liabilities_tkr.notes: Includes supplier debts (393 tkr), tax liabilities (16 tkr), and accrued expenses (116 tkr)

total_equity_tkr.notes: Total equity including restricted and unrestricted equity

current_year_result_tkr.notes: Current year result shown in both income statement and balance sheet

chairman_name.notes: Chairman of the board (Styrelseordförande) with signature on page 16

balance_equation_check.notes: Balance equation verified: Assets (19,443.977) = Equity (18,913.171) + Liabilities (530.806)

net_result_consistency_check.notes: Net result consistent between income statement and balance sheet

no_loans_confirmed.notes: Association has no loans as stated on page 3 and confirmed by zero long-term liabilities

fund_for_external_maintenance.notes: Fund for external maintenance tracking verified from Note 14

overall_confidence_score.notes: All data extracted from clearly labeled financial statements with complete documentation. High confidence in all extracted values.

key_observations.positive_result: Association achieved positive result of 206 tkr after previous year loss of -482 tkr
key_observations.no_debt: Association is debt-free (inga lån) with strong financial position
key_observations.high_soliditet: Very high equity ratio of 97%, indicating strong financial stability
key_observations.ongoing_renovation: Major window replacement project ongoing (1,562 tkr in progress)
key_observations.liquid_assets: Strong liquidity with 3,910 tkr in total liquid assets (cash + investments)
key_observations.maintenance_planning: Active maintenance plan 2015-2035 with annual reservations to fund
key_observations.tax_implications: State income tax of 48 tkr due to investment income
